result.eng: Tell him to wait for me.
result.html: Abair leis fanacht liomTell him to wait for me.
result.ponchtml: Abair leis fanaċt liomTell him to wait for me.

result.eng: We'll have to wait until Budget Day.

result.orig: Beidh orainn fanacht go Lá na Cáinaisnéise

result.ponchtml: Beiḋ orainn fanaċt go Lá na CáinaisnéiseWe'll have to wait until Budget Day.

result.html: Fan bomaiteWait a minute!

result.eng: Wait till you hear the news.

result.eng: If you wait a second I'll ask him.

result.ga: Ní féidir liom fanacht níos faide

result.eng: You don't need to wait till the end.
